review_text: Really recommend them. They were extremely efficient, communicative, and accommodating. I paid £207 for five boxes to be transported from Edinburgh to London. They were flexible with the amount of boxes and the shape, type, weight, and contents of the boxes (unlike other companies that are so picky). They delivered and dropped off on time and gave me a narrow time window, so I didn’t have to wait around all day. I called several times with questions and this lovely lady always answered and was very clear and on the ball. She quickly changed my order for me at late notice. The delivery man was also very adaptive and communicative with timings. The service was really everything I wanted (my friends have had nightmare experiences with other companies like LoveSpace). So I really recommend AZ movers.
Very communicative and affordable. Helpful with pick-up and drop-off, keeping constant updates throughout to maintain assurance about the safety of your belongings. Would definitely recommend :)

review_title: Great Customer service the movers we're…
review_text:
Great Customer service the movers we're excellent! I highly recommend them Initially hired someone else but they couldn't move my wardrobe and piano up the 4th floor and after speaking with someone from the office she convinced me that they can do it!

Excellent job by Gerry with my Piano & Dave!

Removers were excellent; fast, efficient and safe (didn't smash anything or mark walls) and no complaints despite having to carry all items up 4 flights of stairs (no lift), very impressed! Lovely guys and friendly, would definitely recommend for the money!

review_title: It was a real pleasure working with…
review_text: It was a real pleasure working with Victoria. She ensured that the whole experience was as smooth as possible. AZ Movers organised the best moving company - they were efficient and friendly. The cleaners came out after the movers collected all my stuff and did a splendid job - every nook and cranny was sparkling. My end of tenancy experience was very smooth indeed with no complaints. I would use them in future without a doubt and would recommend them to anybody who wanted a hassle free experience. Well done AZ Movers and a big thank you!

Excellent.
Victoria answered the phone and booked the service.
On the day, two guys came on time. They worked almost nonstop.  All items moved to the destination. Unloaded and left.
Didnt waste even one minute.
Carefully handled everything.

You cannot get any better service than this.
I would recommend to everyone

Boys were polite, and careful with our furniture, which was very heavy. As our flat was actually behind the road down a lane, they were unable to drive down close to the house. This meant they had to walk up the lane and along to where they could park carrying heavy furniture. This was after coming down 26 stairs. Not once did they complain. I would certainly recommend this company for reasonable pricing and obliging staff.

Thanks so much to Victoria and George for organising my move from London to Scotland. Victoria was very helpful and quick in her replies, the quote was extremely reasonable and nothing was too much trouble. George and his colleague were very friendly, helpful and accommodating. They moved my belongings including a piano and were very careful and considerate. Thank you so much - I would highly recommend!

review_title: If you're deciding to use AZ Movers…
review_text: If you're deciding to use AZ Movers than 100 go ahead, i highly recommend them very punctual, easy to work with and I have used them on multiple locations. David does my moves so I would say ask for him :)

I found them on a search engine and they did not disappoint. All booking done by phone with a very friendly and efficient lady. During that phonecall she gave me my estimate then said that would be the price on the day. Done deal. Got a confirmation email with in minutes of the phone call ending.
On the day two young lads turned up early and went straight to work. Never complained and were constantly helpful ( in even trying to keep my stress level under control) one of them cut both his hands and just taped them up ( plasters were packed somewhere) and carried on. 
The company were fantastic from beginning to end.  At least £70 less than every other company I contacted. I can’t recommend them enough.

review_title: We moved from Edinburgh to Peebles and…
review_text:
We moved from Edinburgh to Peebles and Mo with his assistant moved us. These guys were great and I couldn’t recommend them highly enough.
Pleasant, careful with our belongings, very helpful all round.

review_title: Didn't turn up or reply to my calls
review_text: I booked them for a local move and they ghosted me on the day - I got an email a few days before confirming the booking, and then they didn't answer any emails or calls for the next few days and simply didn't turn up on the booked day. I assume they got a better paying job and decided to ignore me.
owner_answer:
Hello Sarah,

I am sorry you experienced this, I can assure you we do not think any moves are small or large all customers are important to us. 

Moves are booked when deposits are paid & after requesting your information I cannot locate  your deposit or information in Scheduled or Booked moves,  Please email us on info@azmovers.co.uk and we will refund your deposit.

review_text:
Terrible company! Would not recommend for anyone to use. They offer a dismantling and reassemble service which was shocking service.
Nails, bolts and screws not put back into items when reassembling. Wardrobe just about fell on top of us as there was no nails added to hold it together. 
Cowboys

review_title: Price gauging, scam artists, that don't give a duck
review_text: Charged me an additional £100 on the day for "additional extras" and told I could speak to the office if I was unhappy but they would charge me more, which was the case. Damaged walls, furniture, and other belongings. Move was almost 2 months ago and I'm still waiting on a response to fix my f**king wall.

review_title: Two men one large removal van
review_text: Two men one large removal van. Outstanding service. They were polite, prompt and courteous. They made my move smooth and hassle free. I would highly recommend their services to anyone. Well done lads and thanks again.

review_title: Incredibly happy with service from AZ…
review_text: Incredibly happy with the service from AZ Movers. An affordable quote followed by quick and helpful service on the day of the move itself. Would recommend to anyone and everyone!

review_title: Good  removal job but the number of…
review_text: Good  removal job but the number of followup calls asking for feedback is ridiculous.  Multiple emails and three phone calls was too many.  I would have given them 5 stars apart from the nuisance follow ups.

review_title: My experience was perfect from the…
review_text: My experience was perfect from the removal to the service it self! No damage was done everything went smoothly, the price was reasonable. I would highly recommend.
owner_answer: Hi Maria, Thank You for the review please recommend us to Friends and Family.

review_text: Excellent! I hired AZ Movers for our 4 bedroom move from Edinburgh to Peterborough I Recommend them completely and will use then again in the near future.
Affordable price, i was kept up-to-date in the days leading up to the move, the movers were super friendly and quickly, couldnt have asked for anything more
The guys did a fantastic, professional job moving my upright piano up a flight of tricky stairs. I would highly recommend them.

review_title: Great company they turned up on time so…
review_text: Great company they turned up on time so polite and really hard working made it look so easy I would definitely get them again so professional.

These guys arrived on time, and safely loved our stuff in under an hour. So much quicker than I would have done. 

The booking process was so easy , I had to change details a few times and they did that no bother. 

Would definitely use them again.

We had a superb experience with AZ Movers and would gladly recommend them. They helped us with a last minute move, at a very reasonable price. No stress, no fuss.

Thanks very much!

Don't touch.
Turned up in the morning one hour late. The amount of damage they did to walls, bannister and furniture was unbelievable. They even left a pushbike outside my old house (not mine!) as they didn't want it. I did ask and pay for another man and van at short notice which ended up being the same guys doing 2 trips. We were moving 50 miles away. At 8pm I told them to leave the rest of my stuff as I was exhausted. I have contacted the company about most of the damage and the bike being left but they replied they had received my email and then nothing. Initially they were lovely to deal with but aftercare is appalling. I maybe depends on who you get to move your items.
The movers were very professional and friendly - they made the move easy and stress free. In addition they were the best priced. I would highly recommend this company.

We need move to new home, a lots of something need move, 2 peoples can do everything fast,  Even we need dorp off something  to  Happy Rice Takeway( Shop 
tel: 01312026288  ), they still only used 2 hours is done, Good Price and Good service !  thanks  Ocean

review_title: The movers did an excellent job though…
review_text: The movers did an excellent job though the guys in edinburgh were better than the guys who delivered in Ayr.

review_title: The guys have been incredibly well…
review_text: The guys have been incredibly well organized and polite! Thanks again to all of you for accomplishing such good service.
Excellent service. Very polite and efficient. Very competitive price wise too. I would highly recommend. I will definitely use again in the future.
Excellent service, would not hesitate to recommend this company.  They made my move so easy.  Thank you!
Job well done! Arrived on time and helpful, friendly team. Worked hard and way lower cost than other quotes. Moving house is pretty stressful, but I think we got this bit right.
I would highly recommend using this service. Not only was it cost effective, but they took great care of my belongings getting them from A to B. They really took away the stress of moving!

review_title: I hadn’t heard of this company before…
review_text: I hadn’t heard of this company before but I’m so glad I chose them to help me move. The guys were so nice and nothing seemed a problem. The move was smooth and better than I imagined it could be!
Great value! The two guys sent were fantastic. Could not do enough to help and get you moved into you new home with minimal fuss or delays.
Very fast and professional. Moved a piano, it hasn't gone out of tune!
Fast and very good service, I don't have any hesitations to reccommend your service.

review_title: Smooth pick up and delivery despite it…
review_text: Smooth pick up and delivery despite it not being straightforward.  Co-operative and 'can do' attitude.

Price and service are excellent. 

Keep up the good work!
Really helpful, straightforward and great value.
Very good service! I recommend.
Good guys, great service
Very professional and efficient. Good job.
Fantastic service.
